ingredients.item: 3 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs
200g Waitrose Sweet & Juicy Cherries, pitted and halved

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C, gas mark 4. Base line a 22cm square tin with baking parchment.
Meanwhile, place the chocolate and butter in a bowl over a pan of simmering water to melt. Stir in the Disaronno.
Whisk together the eggs and sugar until pale and thickened. Stir in the chocolate. Fold in the flour and baking powder, and spoon into the tin. Scatter over the cherries.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until just cooked through. Cool slightly and cut into 16 squares.
